Comments_List: Czech L2 - much more emphasis on grammar than vocabulary
I learned a lot about the Czech language and culture
Learned different verb tenses, declensions and adjectives. Started to read.

This is a great course because KvK is so awesome! The readings and movies were really awesome. She also makes the course very flexible - which allows it to be kind of personalized. If the class needs more time/less time on one concept, she adjusts accordingly.
I struggled throughout the course but felt comfortable with the material
Great course! A really complicated, tough language but not an overwhelming workload - def the best slavic language choice if you're looking for a fun class where you can do well!
